terminalCTA.title: ## Discover the art of wine with Vinovardag
terminalCTA.description: Ready to explore the world of wine like never before? With Vinovardag, each sip becomes a story and every experience is crafted to delight. Book your journey into Swedish Lapland's unique wine culture today!
terminalCTA.label: Get in touch

faq.title: ## Frequently asked questions
faq.description:
Discover answers to your questions about Vinovardag's unique wine experiences and services.

Questions? Get in touch at hanna@vinovardag.se

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: We provide a range of services including sommelier consultations, wine tastings, and culinary experiences. Our offerings are tailored to meet the needs of local businesses and international tourists. Each experience is designed to highlight the best of Swedish Lapland's wine culture.

items.question: How can I book?
items.answer: You can book our services directly through our website using the booking form, or by contacting us via email or phone. For customized experiences, we recommend reaching out directly so we can tailor the experience to your preferences.

items.question: Are your experiences customizable?
items.answer: Yes, most of our experiences can be customized to meet your specific preferences and needs. Whether you're looking for a private wine tasting, a corporate event, or a specialized culinary experience, we can work with you to create the perfect offering.

items.question: What is your location?
items.answer: We are located in Kiruna, Sweden, the northernmost city in Swedish Lapland. Situated 145 km north of the Arctic Circle, Kiruna offers a magical setting with the northern lights in winter and the midnight sun in summer. Our location provides the perfect backdrop for exceptional wine experiences surrounded by Lapland's pristine wilderness and stunning natural beauty.

items.question: Do you offer tastings?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a variety of wine tastings featuring carefully selected wines from around the world, with special attention to unique and boutique wineries. Our tastings can be paired with local delicacies for a complete culinary experience.

items.question: I don't drink alcohol, can I still participate?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer non-alcoholic alternatives for all our tastings and experiences. Our goal is to create inclusive experiences where everyone can enjoy the culinary journey, regardless of their beverage preferences.

aboutHanna.quote: Hanna's expertise in wine is unmatched. She effortlessly combines deep knowledge with a warm, approachable style, creating unforgettable tasting experiences.
aboutHanna.heading: ## Sommelier Hanna crafts unforgettable wine experiences, blending the flavors of the Lappish wilderness with her passion for wine.
aboutHanna.paragraph:
Based in the heart of Swedish Lapland, in the city of Kiruna, Hanna creates experiences that not only highlight the best of international and local wines but also reflect the stunning natural beauty and rich culture of the region.

Whether it's uncovering rare vintages or showcasing sustainable winemaking practices, Hanna's expertise sets the stage for truly unforgettable wine experiences.

validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number

contactForm.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try later.

items.title: ### Sustainability at Heart
items.text: Rooted in the breathtaking landscapes of Swedish Lapland, sustainability guides our choices. We partner with vineyards that share our respect for the environment and strive to deliver authentic wine experiences that honor nature's balance and the purity of our Arctic home.

items.title: ### Ethically Sourced, Exceptionally Crafted
items.text: We believe that great wine tells a story of integrity. That's why we meticulously select wines from producers who are committed to ethical practices, ensuring every bottle reflects quality, responsibility, and a deep respect for the craft and the people behind it.

items.title: ### Fostering Community & Connection
items.text: Vinovardag is dedicated to enriching our community by creating shared experiences. We aim to connect people through the joy of wine, celebrating local culture and fostering a welcoming space for discovery, learning, and genuine human connection in the heart of Swedish Lapland.

metadata.title: About Vinovardag | Wine and Culinary Experiences in Swedish Lapland
metadata.description: Learn about Vinovardag and sommelier Hanna's passion for creating unique wine and culinary experiences in the heart of Swedish Lapland.

hero.title: # Bringing exceptional wine experiences to the Swedish Arctic
hero.description: At Vinovardag, we believe that extraordinary wine experiences should be accessible everywhere - even in the remote beauty of Swedish Lapland. Our mission is to create memorable moments where wine culture meets the pristine arctic environment.

about.title: ## Vinovardag's Story
about.description:
Founded with a passion for wine and a deep connection to the Arctic region, Vinovardag has grown from a dream to a recognized destination for wine lovers and culinary enthusiasts. We've created a space where traditional wine culture harmoniously blends with the unique flavors and experiences of Swedish Lapland.

Our journey started with a simple idea: to bring the world of fine wines to the heart of the north, creating experiences that respect both the sophistication of wine culture and the authenticity of Arctic traditions.

The serene landscapes of Swedish Lapland are not just a backdrop for our experiences; they are an integral part of them. We believe that the purity of the Arctic air and the tranquility of its vast wilderness enhance the appreciation of fine wines, creating a sensory journey unlike any other. Our events often incorporate elements of the local environment, from foraged ingredients to outdoor tastings under the Northern Lights or midnight sun.

At Vinovardag, every detail is thoughtfully curated, from the selection of wines to the ambiance of each gathering. We are dedicated to continuous learning and exploration within the world of wine, ensuring that we always bring fresh perspectives and exceptional quality to our guests. Our aim is not just to serve wine, but to share stories, create connections, and leave a lasting impression of warmth and discovery.

hannaProfile.title: ## Meet Hanna
hannaProfile.subtitle: Founder & Sommelier
hannaProfile.bio:
As a certified sommelier and native of Swedish Lapland, Hanna brings a unique perspective to the world of wine. Her journey began with a curiosity about how global wine traditions could be experienced through the lens of Nordic culture.

Hanna's expertise spans from classic European wines to emerging regions, always with an eye for sustainable and authentic productions. She has trained in prestigious wine regions across Europe and brings this knowledge back to create experiences that are both educational and deeply enjoyable.

With over a decade of experience in hospitality and wine education, Hanna has developed a teaching style that makes wine accessible to everyone - from curious beginners to seasoned connoisseurs.
hannaProfile.quote: Wine is not just about what's in the glass – it's about creating connections between people, places, and moments in time.

metadata.title: Services | Wine Tastings & Culinary Adventures by Vinovardag
metadata.description: Explore Vinovardag's professional sommelier services including wine tastings, outdoor culinary experiences, and customized wine journeys in Swedish Lapland.

hero.title: # Discover the art of wine with a professional sommelier
hero.description: With over a decade of experience in the world's finest wine regions, I offer personalized services that bring the vineyard experience to you. Whether you're hosting an intimate gathering or a large corporate event, my expertise will ensure your wine selection perfectly complements your occasion.

service.title: ### Exquisite wine tastings
service.description:
Experience the art of wine tasting with a professional sommelier. Our wine tastings are designed to be educational and enjoyable, and are perfect for groups of any size.

- Customized wine selection
- Professional tasting notes
- Wine region education
- Available for groups of 2-20
service.altText: One snowboarding riding powder in Ylläs-Pallas National Park

service.title: ### Outdoor culinary experiences
service.description:
Combine the beauty of nature with exceptional wines. These outdoor experiences pair scenic locations with perfectly matched wines and seasonal cuisine.

- Vineyard picnics
- Garden tastings
- Seasonal food pairings
service.altText: One snowboarding riding powder in Ylläs-Pallas National Park

service.title: ### Customized Culinary Journeys
service.description:
A complete sensory experience that pairs fine wines with gourmet cuisine. Work with me to create a memorable journey through complementary flavors.

- Multi-course wine pairings
- Chef collaboration
- Custom menu development
- Private dining experiences
service.altText: One snowboarding riding powder in Ylläs-Pallas National Park
